name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Breaker: A chat room for every subreddit.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Breaker puts a chat room beside every subreddit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*** This product is in beta, please send us any problems you find! ***

Breaker is like IRC or Slack, but made just for Reddit. 

Use your reddit username and flair, helpful bots post stuff from the subreddit into the channel, subreddit moderators automatically become channel operators, and a lot more.

Breaker is in alpha - thanks for helping us test it and we'd love your feedback!
